reviewText: Cool series. i like how it shows the drives actual lives too.

I am very pleased with my DVD purchase. Just what I wanted. I do not like being told how many words I need to write for this review. I do not even need to do this much. Change here would be good. Sincerely, Rick L.
Disjointed ametuerish and didn't flow.  Realy didn't give me an insight into the life of a drag racer.  Couldnt keep me engaged at all.

This is not about drgsters and racing. This is about everything except racing.
It's boring and in bad taste.

If you enjoy drag racing you'll enjoy this, it's entertaining & informative, and doesn't feel as staged or scripted as some reality shows can. Recommended it to Drag Racing fans, and if you are looking to get someone into the sport this explains a lot of what goes on really well.

I've never been a drag racing fan, when my boyfriend gave me this I thought he was out of his damn mind...but I love this show! It's something we can both watch because it has so much behind the scenes stuff to make it interesting for me. I love it!
